Southeastern Australia Bushfire Weather and Drivers (1979-2019)

Source: R/data.R
ausbushfire_data.Rd

A dataset containing key fire weather indices (FWI, MSR), their climate drivers (temperature, precipitation, IOD, SAM), and the resulting burned area for Southeastern Australia from 1979 to 2019.

Usage

ausbushfire_data

Format

A data frame with 41 observations and 8 variables:

year

The observation year (1979-2019)

fwi_sm

The highest 7-day mean FWI (FWI7x-SM)

msr_sm

The maximum Monthly Severity Rating (MSR-SM)

tmax

Annual maximum 7-day mean maximum temperatures (TX7x)

precip_total

Total precipitation during the fire season (Sep-Feb)

iod_mean

Mean Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) index for Sep-Dec

sam_mean

Mean Southern Annular Mode (SAM) index for Sep-Dec

area_burned

Total fire season burned area (MODIS, km2)

Source

https://climexp.knmi.nl/bushfires_timeseries.cgi
